name: Angular-jekyll-editor
tagline: Angular based editor for jekyll based sites
body:
# Angular based editor for jekyll based sites

This is an angular based editor for [jekyll](http://jekyllrb.com/) based sites.
Its intended for use with sites hosted on github pages.
Github pages are awsome project but so less people can handle git or jekyll details.
This is goal of the angular-jekyll-editor.

It uses:
- [Lineman](http://www.linemanjs.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
